text: Anisotes diversifolius is a species of plant in the family Acanthaceae. It is endemic to Yemen. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and rocky areas. ==References== Category:Acanthaceae Category:Endemic flora of Socotra Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1884 Category:Taxa named by Isaac Bayley Balfour
title: Anisotes diversifolius
